body: Rant at the end made it worth the read, and on page 15 instead of saying "Those Kids...", Sojiro should say "hoo boy".
...shit. Well I fixed the typo on the E-Hentai version.

That rant attached on the end there... It's funny to me because he changed the word "massage" to "message" when he did the editing. The reference being to a massage that lets you do stuff in the evening after exploring a Palace during the day, he made a mistake in changing it. >.>
"you want me to leave my knee-socks on?" damn, you know my flavor
